text: Naftali Blumenthal (; 1 March 1922 – 1 May 2022) was an Israeli politician. He was a member of the Knesset for the Alignment from 1981 until 1984. He was born in Stanisławów, Poland. Blumenthal died on 1 May 2022 at the age of 100.נפתלי בלומנטל נפטר Labor Movement ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Israeli politicians Category:Israeli centenarians
title: Naftali Blumenthal
